name: Apodcalypse
description:
The Interstellar Titan hit a mostly harmless Black Hole.

Now it's sinking into the event horizon

Everyone has made it to the escape pods and are trying to escape the pull of the black hole.

Use your Grappling Hook to get through the debris and other pods to ensure your survival!

Supports up to 4 Gamepads!

Made during TrainJam2016!

Credits

Jonathan Palmer - www.JonathanPalmerGD.com (Programmer)
